name: outrank
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to have a higher rank than someone: As Superintendent, she outranked all the other police officers in the room.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to have greater importance than someone or something, or to have a higher rank than someone: She outranks the other officers involved in the investigation.
